snippet: Mitt Romney has pulled ahead of Newt Gingrich in the Florida polls and is the favorite in many of the February contests, but Mr. Gingrich has vowed to continue on until the Republican convention in August.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney has pulled ahead of Newt Gingrich in the Florida polls and is the favorite in many of the February contests, but Mr. Gingrich has vowed to continue on until the Republican convention in August.

headline.seo: The Republican Nomination: Going the Distance
headline.main: The Republican Nomination: Going the Distance
